org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.hooks

Class ReadEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.hooks.Entity
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.hooks.ReadEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ReadEntity
extends Entity
implements Serializable
    This class encapsulates the information on the partition and tables that are read by the query.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • isFromTopLevelQuery

        public transient boolean isFromTopLevelQuery
        https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-15048 It is possible that the same table is used in top level query and a sub-query, e.g. select * from T where T.c in (select c from T inner join S on T.a=S.b)
